entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this evening then cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
